author: CBS News
title: U.S. coronavirus deaths surpass 8,000 while hospitals struggle to treat patients
description: States across the country are struggling to treat an influx of coronavirus patients as more governors enact stay-at-home orders. New York has been hit the hardest, with at least 3,500 deaths. Michael Geroge reports.
